body:
The following packages are missing from `bitcoincore.org/depends-sources` which is the default fall-back for depends packages. Tested with `make download` and custom blocker rules to block out the source for each package as listed in its respective `bitcoin/depends/packages/*.mk` file.

##### 1. Boost 1.71.0
```
Fetching boost_1_71_0.tar.bz2 from https://bitcoincore.org/depends-sources
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
  0     0    0     0    0     0      0      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--     0
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
```

##### 2. Miniupnpc-2.0.20180203

```
Fetching 4536032ae32268a45c073a4d5e91bbab4534773a.tar.gz from https://bitcoincore.org/depends-sources
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
  0     0    0     0    0     0      0      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--     0
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
```

##### 3. ds_store (v1.3.0.tar.gz)

```
fetching v1.3.0.tar.gz from https://bitcoincore.org/depends-sources
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
  0     0    0     0    0     0      0      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--     0
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
```

##### 4. mac_alias (v2.1.1.tar.gz)

```
Fetching v2.1.1.tar.gz from https://bitcoincore.org/depends-sources
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current
                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed
  0     0    0     0    0     0      0      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--     0
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
```

Note: sqlite is also missing as reported in #20170
title: Missing depends packages on fallback bitcoincore.org/depends-sources
